original_title: Bus fares revised with effect from Thursday (30); Authorities release Full List of revised fares
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's transportation authorites have decided to revise the bus fares with effect from Thursday (30) midnight.
The bus fare revision was announced following the fuel price reduction that was announced earlier in the day, by the Power and Energy Minister.
Accordingly, the minimum bus fare will be reduced to Rs. 30/- from Rs. 34/-.
